resources.string:
BPR is a new power metric for the FIRST Robotics Competition. BPR shows a team's average contribution to a specific scoring target. BPR allows you to look at data beyond a team's estimated contribution to their alliance's score. 

A team's BPR in a scoring area shows the team's average contribution to that specific scoring area. For example, a Steamworks robot that scored a large number of points spending the entirety of every match dumping fuel into the low goal would have a high low-goal BPR but a low climbing and rotor BPR. 

The BPR app is open-source at https://github.com/dc74089/jen-scout. The app is a thin Android GUI for an open-source Java library used to find BPR, which can be found at https://github.com/dc74089/frc-power-calc. 


Created with pigs and rockets by Exploding Bacon, FRC Team 1902.
